name: Artisan Perfume Locket - Your Choice of Scent!!
description:
Artisan Perfume Lockets™ are handcrafted in the USA using vintage molds and presented in a romanitic Antique Brass finish. Each locket measures 44x33mm and comes with a matching bail to easily hang on your favorite vintage chain. Inside is a refillable perfume tin completely filled with an all natural bees wax based solid designer Mystic Memories Artisan Perfume blend. Your perfume locket comes beautifully gift boxed for easy gift giving.

YOU PICK SCENT ~ Artisan Master Frgarance List Here:
http://www.the-mystic-memories.com/category_23/Master-Fragrance-List.htm

All sales final due to sanitary reasons. Our products are hand-made fresh to order.  Please allow 7 to 10 (business) days after payment clears for delivery.

name: Secret Scents Perfume Lockets ~ Vintage Romance Tea and Compnay / Tea Linen
description:
Tea & Comapny ~ Art by Brigid Ashwood

Artisan Fragrance: Tea Linen - The perfect fragrance for an afternoon spent in an English garden taking tea with your suitor. Bright notes of cotton merges with delightful notes of lavender, black amber and soft musk. Dab a little on your neck and wrist and don’t be surprised if any gentleman present mistake you for the petit fours. Presented in Antique Brass (Designer Gold Plate) Locket.

All sales final due to sanitary reasons. Our products are hand-made fresh to order.  Please allow 7 to 10 (business) days after payment clears for delivery.

name: Secret Scents Perfume Locket ~ Victorian Steampunk Bee Love / Honeyed Amber
description:
Bee Love  ~ Art By Brigid Ashwood 

Artisan Fragrance: Honeyed Amber - This signature scent is warm, inviting and fit for a queen. Exotic notes of golden amber resin are kissed with succulent hints of honey to create a fragrance that is both seductive and opulent. Presented in Antique Brass (Designer Gold Plate) Locket.
